SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob.ui.home

Class EventImageAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventImageAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.haboob.ui.home.EventImageAdapter
public class EventImageAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventImageAdapter.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView adapter that renders a horizontal carousel of event posters by URL.

Usage:

  1. Create an instance, optionally passing a click callback via EventImageAdapter(OnItemClick) or setOnItemClick(OnItemClick).
  2. Populate items using replaceItems(Collection) or replaceItems(List) and pass a parallel list of event IDs with inputIDs(List).
  3. Handle item taps in the hosting Fragment/Activity by implementing EventImageAdapter.OnItemClick.

Data contracts: The position of each image URL is assumed to align with the same index in eventIDs. Clicks use RecyclerView.ViewHolder.getBindingAdapterPosition() to resolve the event ID safely at bind-time.

Author: David T, Oct 25, 2025

      public void replaceItems(Collection<String> newItems)

      Note: Also see the replaceItems(List) overload. Consider keeping only one overload to avoid ambiguity.

      Parameters:
      newItems - new set of image URLs; null clears the list

    • replaceItems

      public void replaceItems(List<String> newItems)

    • inputIDs

      public void inputIDs(List<String> eventIDs)
      Supplies the parallel list of event IDs corresponding to the current imageUrls. The order must match the image list for click handling to resolve the correct ID.
      Parameters:
      eventIDs - event identifiers aligned by index with imageUrls

    • inputTitles

      public void inputTitles(List<String> eventTitles)
      Supplies the parallel list of event titles corresponding to the current imageUrls. The order must match the image list for displaying the correct title.
      Parameters:
      eventTitles - event titles aligned by index with imageUrls

    • setInvitedEventIDs

      public void setInvitedEventIDs(List<String> invitedEventIDs)
      Sets which event IDs should display a red dot indicator (user has been invited).
      Parameters:
      invitedEventIDs - list of event IDs that should show the red dot

    • onBindViewHolder

      public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull EventImageAdapter.ViewHolder holder, int position)
      Binds the URL at position into the given holder using Glide and attaches a click listener that resolves the matching event ID (if present) and invokes EventImageAdapter.OnItemClick.

      Image loading: Glide handles memory/disk caching. A placeholder and error drawable are provided for better UX.

      Specified by:
      onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventImageAdapter.ViewHolder>
      Parameters:
      holder - the view holder to bind into
      position - adapter position

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      the number of items currently bound to the adapter
